name: Glory
description:
War decides power and history, sorts the cowards from the brave and crumbles one civilisation and thrives another. What if you had the power to do this? Command your army through harsh terrain, combat and battle to achieve victory. Can you? Become a Commander yourself and fight for glory!

Key Features


A Single Player Campaign full of action and combat waiting for you.

Unlock Unique Soldiers As You Progress.

Command An Army and Defeat Your Enemy.

Multiplayer for versing your friends or others to see how great a Commander you really are, once you're up for the challenge.

The game is a simple war game but it does have multiplayer for if you complete the campaign. I know it isn't a large game, but it's something to think about.

Specifics


You, as Commander, hire soldiers amid battle with coins which are gained every few seconds or from killing enemy soldiers. At the start of the game, you only have one soldier but as you progress you will unlock more to hire. The aim of the game is to protect your camp, weapons shipment or cargo and destroy the enemy's.
